name: jasmin-realtime
postCreateCommand: apt-get update; apt-get install -y git; /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install -U autopep8; /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade build; /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade twine; echo "alias build='rm -rf dist/*; python3 -m build'; alias push='python3 -m twine upload -u __token__ -p \$PYPI_TOKEN dist/*'; export PYPI_TOKEN=pypi-AgEIcHlwaS5vcmcCJDU0YzcxNWQ5LTVmNzktNDk2ZC05NzdjLWM3OTQ1MDYzNDJiNQACIlsxLFsiamFzbWluLW1vbmdvLWNvbmZpZ3VyYXRpb24iXV0AAixbMixbIjYyMDY3NGY3LTY3NWYtNDI5NS1hY2RiLTNhMGEzZTliYWE5MiJdXQAABiChD7W6AEiAkQqqIM0p1xoXQcO5OBDWG5OQkJL4DxdkJA" > ~/.bashrc
